name: On The Brink of Link
description:
Controls are WASD.

A short walking simulator following the verses of a poem I wrote for the game jam. The art is all hand-drawn on paper, scanned and collisions were added in the game engine.

While the game mechanically contains no elements of the theme "joined together", the poem itself and the art revolve around themes of connections to others.

The game was made with Godot as game engine, GIMP for image manipulation, pen and paper.
